name: some squids cant paint
description:
Top down 2D Shooter where the accuracy of your shot slowly gets more and more unstable. 

CONTROLS: WASD to move and move your mouse around to aim

MORE INFO: Currently only 1 working level exists. You have 2 lives. The red target is an item pickup which will reset your accuracy degradation and can be picked up simply by walking into it.

All music/sound effects were done by cactuslick (check more of him out here: YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvtbZMXdYRGyoIl7-Ue-leg INSTAGRAM: @yutaozng).

Rest of the game was made by CommonDiyar.
